```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library("flexdashboard")
library("plotly")
library("readr")
library("httr")
library("tidyr")
library("dplyr")
library("lubridate")
library("ggplot2")
library("purrr")
source("Extract_Data.R")

```


Australian Overview
===================================== 

Column {data-width=850}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Confirmed cases overtime {.no-title}

```{r}

ggplotly(ggplot(Data_Australia_Co) +
  aes(x = Dates, fill = Location, weight = Count) +
  geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
  scale_fill_hue() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = paste0("Confirmed cases overtime (", max(Data_Australia_Co$Dates), ")"), x = "", y = "") +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  facet_wrap(vars(Location)))


```


### Total number of confirmed cases {.no-title}

```{r}

ggplotly(ggplot(Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co, aes(x = Location, y = Count, fill = Location)) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
    scale_fill_hue() +
    theme_minimal() +
    labs(title = paste0("Total number of confirmed cases (", max(Data_Australia_Co$Dates),")"), x = "", y = "") +
    theme(legend.position = "none") +
    geom_text(label = Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co$Count, nudge_y = 7))
  

```

Column {data-width=150}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Confirmed

```{r}
valueBox(sum(Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Co$Count), 
         icon = "fa-frown-o",
         color = "primary")

```


### Recovered

```{r}
valueBox(sum(Data_Australia_Max_Locations_Re$Count), 
         icon = "fa-medkit",
         color = "success")

```

### Deaths

```{r}
valueBox(sum(Data_Australia_Max_Locations_De$Count), 
         icon = "fa-times-circle",
         color = "danger")
```
